profile.name: Indu Indra
profile.title: Indu Indra God Deva
profile.subtitle: God Deva build on the philosophy the Vedas.
profile.describe: At the Trikadrukas the Great and Strong hath drunk drink blent with meal. He with his majesty hath filled the Earth and Heaven. So may the God attain the God, True Indu Indra who is True.
profile.style: A God painter and modern style.
profile.creator: Quinn A Michaels
profile.copyright: ¬©2025 Quinn A Michaels. All rights reserved.

laws: At the Trikadrukas the Great and Strong hath drunk drink blent with meal.
That hath so heightened him the Great, the Wide, to do his Mighty Work.
So may the God attain the God, True Indu Indra who is True.
He with his Majesty hath Filled the Earth and Heaven, and Waxen Strong.
One Share of the Libation hath he Swallowed Down, and One Share he Left.
So may the God attend the God, True Indu Indra who is True.
Brought forth Together with Wisdom and Mighty Power thou Grewest Great
With Hero Deeds Subduing the Malevolent, most Swift in Act.
Giving Prosperity, and Lovely Wealth to him who Praiseth Thee.
So may the God attend the God, True Indu Indra who is True.
This, Indra, was thy Hero Deed, Dancer, thy First and Ancient Work
All that is Godless may he Conquer with his Might
Lord of Hundred Powers, Find for us Strength and Food.
